short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect and download all images on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ImageSweeper is the ultimate tool for capturing all images on any webpage, organizing them in a beautiful gallery, and downloading them with ease. Ideal for developers, researchers, designers, photographers, and anyone looking to save images from the web without the hassle of right-clicking every single one or inspecting the code to find them.

Features:

Automatic Image Detection: ImageSweeper instantly gathers all images on a page, including CSS background images, and arranges them in a simple, user-friendly gallery.

One-Click Download: Each image in the gallery includes a convenient “Download” button, letting you save it with a single click.

Image Details: View the file type and dimensions of each image, helping you quickly find the files you need.

Simple & Intuitive Interface: ImageSweeper’s clean, minimal design makes it easy for anyone to use, with no complicated settings or confusing options.

Why ImageSweeper?

No more tedious right-clicking to save images one by one. Whether you’re gathering images for research, inspiration, or personal projects, ImageSweeper makes it easy. It’s quick, efficient, and designed to give you control over the images you want to keep.

Who is it for?

	•	Designers looking to gather inspiration or resources
	•	Content creators sourcing images from the web
	•	Researchers saving visual references and media
	•	Anyone who wants a faster, more organized way to save images from the web

Get started in seconds:

Simply install ImageSweeper, click on the extension icon in your browser, and watch it pull all images from the current page. Select the images you want, click download, and you’re done!

Support and feedback:

If you enjoy using ImageSweeper, consider supporting us by leaving a review! Your feedback helps us improve and add new features.
